---

# Documentation Issue Report

## Type of Issue
- [ ] Typo
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Suggestion for improvement

## Location
- File/Section: [e.g., README.md, Installation Guide]
- Line/Paragraph: [optional, if known]

## Suggested Correction or Improvement
Explain how this should be corrected or improved.  
(e.g., "Change `teh` to `the`", "Clarify installation steps for Windows users")

## Impact (optional when reporting typo)
Why does this matter?  
(e.g., "Confusing for new users", "Could lead to incorrect usage")

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or references that help explain the issue.
